Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraVoice
Namespace: "urn:zimbraVoice"
GetUCInfo SOAP Command

Get Unified Communications information

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

GetUCInfoRequest

    <GetUCInfoRequest /> ## GetUCInfoRequest

GetUCInfoResponse

    <GetUCInfoResponse> ## GetUCInfoResponse
        <attrs>
            (<attr name="{attr-name}">{value}</attr> ## Attr)*
        </attrs>
    </GetUCInfoResponse>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <GetUCInfoResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/attrs Required (only 1)
/attrs/attr Optional (0 or more) Type:{value}
Description for element text content:Value of attribute
/attrs/attr@name Required (only 1) Type:String
Name of attribute
